*R/save.R*

# view_savedmodel

## View a Saved Model

## Description
View a serialized model from disk. 


## Usage
```r
view_savedmodel(model_dir) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| model_dir | The path to the exported model, as a string. |



## Value
URL for browsing TensorBoard (invisibly).
